meanings.definition: A class of phytoestrogens found in plants.
meanings.sent1: Some plants contain lignans that can act like hormones.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the health benefits of lignans in various plants.
meanings.sent3: The lignans in the plant were like tiny plant superheroes!
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of lignans bloomed like a flower in the garden of science.
meanings.sent5: The presence of lignans in plants is as vital as sunlight for growth.

meanings.sent1: Antioxidants like lignans help protect cells from damage.
meanings.sent2: Including lignans in your diet can boost your antioxidant intake.
meanings.sent3: The lignans in the food fought off the free radicals like tiny shields.
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed with health, thanks to the lignans in her diet.
meanings.sent5: The power of lignans to fight oxidation is like a shield for your body.

meanings.definition: Substances that may have potential health benefits.
meanings.sent1: Many researchers are exploring the health benefits of lignans.
meanings.sent2: Including lignans in your meals could improve your well-being.
meanings.sent3: The lignans seemed to whisper promises of health and vitality.
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels soared after adding lignans to her diet.
meanings.sent5: The potential of lignans to boost health is like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
